name: round pong (s4nt)
description:
I decided it was a good idea to grab the original pong game and turn it in what round pong is. To be honest, it wasn't a good idea, but I've already finished the game.

CLARIFICATION

You play against a bot or another person. it is not an online game so you can't play with someone far away, but you may try multiplayer streaming software such as Parsec.

GAMEPLAY

There's 5 game modes to choose. They are all based on the same mechanics: you rotate a paddle left or right. When you hit the ball, it will turn into your color, and if it goes out of the ring, you will score. You can also hit ball as many times as you want.

Gamemodes are:

CLASSIC

score 8 to win.

60

each hit adds 1 to a counter. Whoever scores gets all the points from it. The first one to score 60 or more wins

TIMER

there's a 75 seconds countdown. Whoever scores the most wins.

DROPLETS

similar to classic mode, but random droplets will appear on the field. They will divert your ball on hit.

SINGLE

A singleplayer mode where you try to hit the ball as many times as possible.
